data.news_body: Sub: Transcript of the Investor Call for the Quarter ended June 30, 2022 In Continuation of our letters dated 29th July, 2022 and 04th August 2022 pursuant to intimation of investor's call and Presentation, we hereby inform that the transcript of the call has been uploaded on the website of the Company and the same can be accessed through the following link:https://www.zf.com/mobile/en/company/investor_relations/zf_cv_india_investor_relations/zf_cv_india_ir.html#shareholderinvestormeeting_acc_656449_0 This intimation is also being made available on the above website link. Request you to take the above information on record.
